name: Fire Fiddler
description:
https://globalgamejam.org/2021/games/fire-fiddler-1 

Submission for the 2021 Global Game Jam

Tia Bennett- Art

Nick Carver - Music

John Russell - Programming

Nicole Yazmin - Sound Design

You are a sentient flame, using your brightness and your banjo to guide moths. The moths will follow you, but you can't let them get too close or they'll burn themselves! Use WASD to move and SPACEBAR to jump. Make your way forward toward the lantern, and don't let those poor moths burn themselves against you! Hurry up before it gets too dark!
